text: tatha jab ve (mushrik) koee nirlajja ka kaam karate hain, to kahate hain ki isee (reeti) par hamane apane poorvajon ko paaya hai tatha allaah ne hamen isaka aadesh diya hai. (he nabee!) aap unase kah den ki allaah kabhee nirlajja ka aadesh nahin deta. kya tum allaah par aisee baat ka aarop dharate ho, jise tum nahin jaanate
